channel.title: Powerbot Members get banned [Not what you think]
channel.description:
So Powerbot hosts an event every so often called PowerWars. PowerWars is when a bunch of the members of PowerBot go and play a game of soul wars together. Each person gets a little rank for it and what ever, but that's aside the point.
Today was one of the days for the event.
Jagex really didn't like the idea, why is beyond me (they play legit during this), but they banned several members, and did something very unique to most:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2mc3RY2qUR8[/youtube]
They did a nice insta kill anim to the people even though some weren't even in game yet.

item.title: Powerbot Members get banned [Not what you think]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Jmood:

This is why you don’t use an account that you wish to lose for events.

I found it funny, that’s actually an powerbot admins account

Read full topic

3lv3n snip3r:

That’s Castle Wars, not Soul Wars.

Plus I haven’t seen castle wars in ages.
My bad.
